node.html:
Established a high level of stakeholder and user intimacy in coordinating all activities, acting as the point of contact for application development planning, applying domain expertise to adjudicate feature requests and development priorities related to solutions such as Shopify, Wordpress, Sharepoint and more.


Responsible for the build out of “Solace Health Online Marketplace” on Shopify Plus using agile methodologies to manage stakeholders, vendors and internal teams in the development of the front-end user experience alongside the integration of the back-end into a cloud-based ERP system.


Automated build and deployment for Shopify development changes using Azure CI/CD Pipelines.


Led team of 4 developers in the implementation of a MicroService API layer built on Azure ServiceFabric in alignment to scalable strategies to enable system integrations within the enterprise.


Piloted the design and development of Employee Portal project on SharePoint in alignment to the digital transformation of the corporation to communicate more effectively to its employees.

Provided web development consulting for clients on business solutions such as websites, web forms, branding, customer service and online services using various CMS systems such as Wordpress, Wix, Yola and more. Built custom web applications based on client requirements utilizing frameworks such as React and Redux.


Ensure all web site development follows W3C web standards and AODA compliance for accessibility and other good practices for web design and development.
